member.name: T:Microsoft.Activities.Build.IWorkflowBuildErrorLogger
member.summary: Provides a method to log an error using the specified filename line and column, message, and property.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Activities.Build.IWorkflowBuildErrorLogger.LogError(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Logs an error using the specified filename line and column, message, and property.
member.param: The filename that contains the error.
The line where the error starts.
The column where the error starts.
The line where the error ends.
The column where the error ends.
The name of the property of the error.
True if the error is a warning; otherwise, false.
